entry.title: Seattle Downtown View from Amazon Spheres
entry.summary: The Amazon Spheres stand as a testament to human creativity, adaptability, and the desire to coexist with nature even in the heart of a bustling Seattle city. With these glass bubbles, weâ€™re reminded that human ingenuity knows no bounds. ðŸŒ¿ðŸŒŽ
